snippet: Sixty vintage Mercedes-Benz 300SLs took over part of the La Quinta Resort in the Southern California desert for the 44th annual convention of the Gull Wing Group.
abstract: Sixty vintage Mercedes-Benz 300SLs converge on La Quinta Resort in Southern California desert for 44th annual convention of Gull Wing Group, formed in 1961 for owners of car with distinctive door design.
lead_paragraph: Sixty vintage Mercedes-Benz 300SLs took over part of the La Quinta Resort in the Southern California desert for the 44th annual convention of the Gull Wing Group.

headline.seo: Sharing Tips That Keep Classic Gullwings Running
headline.main: Sharing the Tips That Keep Classic Gullwings Running
headline.print_headline: Sharing the Tips That Keep Classic Gullwings Running
